tool_description: Generate beautiful QR Codes with custom logo, colors, gradient effects and styles with ease.

api_list.name: Generate QR Code (POST)
api_list.description: Generate a beautiful QR Code with custom logo, colors, gradient effects and styles. This endpoint supports larger requests by using POST method.

required_parameters.name: size
required_parameters.description: The size of the QR code in pixels.

required_parameters.name: format
required_parameters.description: The image format for the QR code (e.g., PNG, JPEG).

required_parameters.name: data
required_parameters.description: The data to encode in the QR code.

optional_parameters.name: error_correction
optional_parameters.description: The level of error correction (L, M, Q, H).

optional_parameters.name: image_size
optional_parameters.description: Size of the logo image (if applicable).

optional_parameters.name: image_margin
optional_parameters.description: Margin size around the QR code.

optional_parameters.name: image_id
optional_parameters.description: ID of the logo image to be included in the QR code.

optional_parameters.name: color
optional_parameters.description: Color of the QR code (hex code).

optional_parameters.name: background_color
optional_parameters.description: Background color of the QR code.

api_list.name: Generate QR Code (GET)
api_list.description: Generate a beautiful QR Code with custom logo, colors, gradient effects and styles using GET method.

required_parameters.name: format
required_parameters.description: The image format for the QR code (e.g., PNG, JPEG).

required_parameters.name: data
required_parameters.description: The data to encode in the QR code.

required_parameters.name: size
required_parameters.description: The size of the QR code in pixels.

optional_parameters.name: error_correction
optional_parameters.description: The level of error correction (L, M, Q, H).

optional_parameters.name: image_margin
optional_parameters.description: Margin size around the QR code.

optional_parameters.name: image_size
optional_parameters.description: Size of the logo image (if applicable).

optional_parameters.name: image_id
optional_parameters.description: ID of the logo image to be included in the QR code.

optional_parameters.name: color
optional_parameters.description: Color of the QR code (hex code).

optional_parameters.name: background_color
optional_parameters.description: Background color of the QR code.

api_list.name: Store Image
api_list.description: Store an image and cache it for generating QR codes with custom logos.

optional_parameters.name: url
optional_parameters.description: URL of the image to be stored.

optional_parameters.name: file
optional_parameters.description: Binary file data of the image.
